question: What is the meaning of the “Government Route” in Foreign Investments?
option1: Investments can be made only with prior permission of the Government or Government authorities
option2: Investments can be made only in partnership with the Government or Government Companies
option3: Investment can be made only in the Government Companies
option4: Investment can be made only via a Foreign Government Body in India
answer: Investments can be made only with prior permission of the Government or Government authorities
